title: ISSO: verification of your residence permit application file (before your online application or your appointment)
description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes to all students, PhD students, researchers and their families studying or working at one of our partner institutions in Grenoble.

Please note

I. You cannot submit a residence permit application directly through this form. It is only intended for the verification of your application file by ISSO before your online application (student residence permits) or prior to your appointment at the on-campus Isère Préfecture office.
II. The validation of your file by ISSO doesn't guarantee its acceptance by the Isère Préfecture.
III. ISSO will only check the main documents of your file. Please refer to the complete list of required documents, available either on the national online application system (for students) or on the UGA international website.
Due to the Covid-19 pandemic, ISSO will only check application files submitted through this online form. Once you complete the form, ISSO will give you a feedback within a week (on average).
The information you provide in filling out this questionnaire will be saved electronically only for the time needed to review your documents, and will be treated as strictly confidential. Only staff members from UGA department of International Affairs (DGD DIT) will be able to access your documents. No information will be communicated to anyone outside of the university. If you wish to exercise your rights within the framework of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, you can make a request by contacting: isso@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr.
zones: Ministère de l'Enseignement supérieur et de la Recherche

champDescriptors.label: Before you start
champDescriptors.description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes. 

> You cannot submit a residence permit application to the Préfecture directly through this form.
> ISSO only checks application files that fall within the scope of the On-campus Préfecture Office. Other requests (i.e. "Salarié", "Réfugié", etc.) will not be considered.
> ISSO cannot guarantee that your application will be accepted by the Isère Préfecture.
> The list of all required documents is available on :
* The national online application system (for students) : https://administration-etrangers-en-france.interieur.gouv.fr/particuliers/#/
* UGA international website (other situations) : https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/en/offices/guides-and-info-sheets/residence-permit-information-for-your-application/

options: Spouse of a Student/ PhD student

champDescriptors.label: Your school/ institution
options: Grenoble INP, Institut d'ingénierie et de management

champDescriptors.label: Expiration date of your current visa or residence permit
Date of your appointment (optional)
champDescriptors.description: Optional, and only if you submit your application at the On-campus prefecture office.

champDescriptors.label: Reminder
champDescriptors.description: Documents written in a language other than French must be translated by a sworn translator accredited by French courts.

champDescriptors.label: Passport
champDescriptors.description: Identity page (if it is your first residence permit card application, add all the pages containing entry stamps in the Schengen Area and other visas)

champDescriptors.label: Current residence permit card or long stay visa
champDescriptors.description: Front and back

champDescriptors.label: If you have an « étudiant-concours » visa
champDescriptors.description:
Certificate of achievement and certificate of the
French embassy or consulate

champDescriptors.label: If you are married
champDescriptors.description: Marriage certificate (or family record book)

champDescriptors.label: ID photos
champDescriptors.description:
ISSO does not check your ID photos. They must correspond to the 35 mm x 45 mm format – ISO/IEC 19794 – 5 : 2005 standard.
If you submit your application online (for students only), you will need to provide an "E-Photo": https://permisdeconduire.ants.gouv.fr/Services-associes/Ou-faire-ma-photo-et-ma-signature-numerisee

champDescriptors.label: Proof of address
champDescriptors.description:
Dated less than 6 months and in your name, or, if you are hosted, in the name of the person hosting you.
Please refer to the official list of accepted documents (see links at the beginning of this form).

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone
champDescriptors.description: « Attestation d’hébergement » form, filled in and signed by the person hosting you.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone [2]
champDescriptors.description: Valid French/European ID, or residence permit card (the address must be up to date), of the person hosting you.

champDescriptors.label: If you stay in a hotel
champDescriptors.description: Statement from the hotel and copy of the last bill (last month max.)

champDescriptors.label: Certificate of enrollment
champDescriptors.description: (Or pre-enrollment certificate, acceptance letter)

champDescriptors.label: UE mobility program (optional)
champDescriptors.description: If you are in a joint educational programme in UE (dual degree for instance), a document from your school/university mentioning this mobility.

champDescriptors.label: Academic transcripts (students) or letter from your thesis supervisor (PhD students)
champDescriptors.description:
Students: academic transcripts from the previous year
PhD students: letter from your thesis supervisor mentioning the subject, achievements and an estimated date for your defense.

champDescriptors.label: Last diploma
champDescriptors.description: Obtained in France (if available)

champDescriptors.label: Proof of financial resources
champDescriptors.description:
At least equivalent to 615€ per month.
The documents must indicate the amount in euros and bank statements have to be stamped and signed.
Please refer to the official list of accepted documents (see links at the beginning of this form).

champDescriptors.label: Proof of financial resources [2] (optional)
champDescriptors.description: If needed, additional document proving your resources.

champDescriptors.label: Additional documents (optional)
champDescriptors.description: Example: medical certificate, letter explaining your curriculum, etc.

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a residence permit "Passeport Talent - Chercheur" (researcher or unemployed)
Current "Convention d’accueil"
champDescriptors.description: Filled in and signed by your host institution

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a "Recherche d'emploi ou création d'entreprise" residence permit
champDescriptors.description: Statement of your research institution certifying the completion of your research and « Attestation de droits à l’assurance maladie » (Sécurité sociale).

champDescriptors.label: If you are enrolled in "Pôle Emploi" and still unemployed
champDescriptors.description: The statement of the "ARE" rights (document issued by Pole Emploi indicating the number of days during which you will receive an allowance).

champDescriptors.label: « Fiche de renseignements » form
champDescriptors.description: Filled in and signed

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a residence permit as a spouse of student or researcher
« Déclaration de communauté de vie » form
champDescriptors.description: Filled in but NOT signed!

champDescriptors.label: Current residence permit / visa of your spouse
If you are a student spouse
champDescriptors.description: Student card of your spouse

champDescriptors.label: If you are a student spouse[2]
champDescriptors.description: Proof of monthly income at least equivalent to 550€

champDescriptors.label: If you are a researcher spouse
champDescriptors.description: "Convention d'accueil" of your spouse

champDescriptors.label: Comments (Optional)
champDescriptors.description: Anything you would like to tell us about your documents ?

champDescriptors.label: Done!
champDescriptors.description: After submitting your application, you will receive a first automatic email. About a week later, ISSO will send you an email to tell you if your application file is complete or not. No need to contact us before that!
